column3: [' (StepDescription: Prepare-Prepare the filter insert by folding the paper filter in half to create a semi-circle
column4: and in half again to create a quarter-circle)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Place-Place the dripper on top of a coffee mug)']
[' (StepDescription: Place-Place the paper filter in the dripper)']

column5: (StepDescription: spread-spread open filter in dripper to create a cone)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: spread open filter in dripper to any shape (not cone))']

column7: (StepDescription: Grind-Grind the coffee beans until the coffee grounds are the consistency of coarse sand
column9: (StepModifiedDescription: Grind the coffee beans about 15 seconds)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Boil-Boil the water. (While the water is boiling

column8: check the temperature of the water. (The water should be between 195-205 degrees Fahrenheit or between 91-96 degrees Celsius. If the water is too hot
column11: check the temperature of the water. Make sure it's too hot (The water should be between 195-205 degrees Fahrenheit or between 91-96 degrees Celsius. ))"]

column3: [' (StepDescription: Transfer-Transfer the grounds to the filter cone)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Pour a big amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds)
column5: (StepDescription: Pour-Pour a small amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Pour a big amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Wait-Wait about 30 seconds for the coffee to bloom. (You will see small bubbles or foam on the coffee grounds during this step.))']
[' (StepDescription: drain-Let the coffee drain completely into the mug before removing the dripper)']
[' (StepDescription: Discard-Discard the paper filter and coffee grounds)']
